TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DockPosition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains values that specify the dock position of an object, represented by a , within a docking container.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement, the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition Bottom = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the UI Automation element is docked along the bottom edge of the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition Fill = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the UI Automation element is docked along all edges of the docking container and fills all available space within the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition Left = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the UI Automation element is docked along the left edge of the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition None = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the UI Automation element is not docked to any edge of the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition Right = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the UI Automation element is docked along the right edge of the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition Top = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the UI Automation element is docked along the top edge of the docking container.
